content:
The Simplifier team recently released the first GA verion of Torinox (1.0), a free FHIR command line tool.
https://simplifier.net/downloads/torinox
Features include: FHIR REST client, files with fhir resources, bundles, packages, validation, etc.

We now also have an R4 version.
https://www.nuget.org/packages/torinox.r4
